abstract: Provincetown, Mass, increasingly struggles through winter months after affluent tourists and second-home owners, who own majority of property, desert town after their summer beach vacations; town officials approve plan to offer tax exemption for full-time residents, move which second-home owners say neglects their contributions to community.
lead_paragraph: Like many summer havens, this town on the tip of Cape Cod is threatened by a shrinking, graying population and scarcities of housing and year-round jobs.

headline.main: Welcome to Provincetown. Winter Population: Dwindling.
headline.print_headline: Welcome to Provincetown. Winter Population: Sinking.

snippet: Like many summer havens, this town on the tip of Cape Cod is threatened by a shrinking, graying population and scarcities of housing and year-round jobs.
